name: Reptilian Dungeon
description:
STORY

Subject (A) , human-crocodile hybrid, wakes up all alone in the reptilian dungeon to find all guards dead, he remembers nothing, not even his name. Confused but hopeful, he searches for freedom from this hellish dungeon.

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow Keys

Team

Music and SFX by: UstymPetrovych

Developed by : Roaa K

Art by: MeBeQuack
